title: SDLC Runner Configuration
description: Configuration schema for SDLC runners with support for runner-specific configs

default.description: Default configuration applied to all runners unless overridden

config.description: Router configuration JSON (same format as claude-code-router config.json). GLM, Ollama, and other providers are configured here.

runners.description: Runner-specific configurations keyed by runner name pattern or label

.*.description: Configuration for runners matching this pattern
